background: RTÉ documentary commissioner focused on current affairs, personal stories and investigative journalism. Seeks bold Irish voices and issue-led documentaries with national impact.
thematic_priorities: Bold Irish voices and untold stories
content_not_wanted: Generic current affairs lacking depth or originality
Stories without clear Irish relevance or impact
target_audience: Irish audiences seeking investigative and issue-led docs
RTÉ viewers across broadcast and digital platforms
current_calls: Investigative and issue-led docs tackling urgent Irish themes
submission_process: Proposal including subject, tone, and structure
name: Colm O’Callaghan
